title: Digital Storytelling-based Microlearning for Pediatric Enuresis Nursing Care

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Nursing Knowledge and Understanding of Child Developmental Stage Characteristics
context.additional_context: Online training program designed to equip nursing managers/leaders with effective management strategies for pediatric incontinence cases in practical settings

learning_goals: Explain core pediatric urology concepts necessary for analyzing pediatric enuresis cases with 80% accuracy
Propose at least three nursing intervention scenarios for enuresis prevention using digital storytelling content
Perform enuresis assessment tool application procedures with 90% accuracy through a 5-minute microlearning module in a smartphone environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
